author: Moneylife Digital Team
title: Quantum Mutual Fund launches eKYC
text: Moneylife » Quantum Mutual Fund launches eKYC 43717 Quantum Mutual Fund launches eKYC 0 Comments, Be the first to comment The online eKYC involves just one simple form, absolutely no paperwork or physical appearance, according to a release from Quantum AMC Quantum Mutual Fund announced the launch of eKYC (electronic Know Your Customer), where it will allow first time investors to fill up a simple form and complete their KYC formalities, in a totally paperless manner, without the need of physical submission of any form / document proofs or physical appearance, according to a release from Quantum AMC. On the launch of the eKYC facility, the CEO of Quantum AMC Jimmy Patel said, “We are proud to offer another completely online facility – eKYC – which will make investing simpler and faster for investors. We have focused on ensuring that first step of investments is very convenient and a completely paperless experience for new investors.” Here’s the 4-step simple process:
